thread.title: Kieran Duffy

author: Kieran Duffy
title: Kieran Duffy
text: Had a flat tyre , wasnt confident in my own ability to change it properly, so found comppany on google, and did everything online, i was kept up to date when van would arrive and what i needed to do, Van turned up when i expected got me to move car, replaced tyre with no fuss, also scanned remaining tyres on my vehicle and advised to get another tyre checked. Very pleased
